name: Dice (itch) (Nnekart, ThibVincProg, Yuna.ink)
description:
Gmtk Game Jam

Platformer with a slime protagonist. Use the dice to get the platforms you need to cross to the other side

Instructions:

Click on the dice to roll it and get the platform you need.
Click to place the platform on the grid

Arrow keys to move

Spacebar to jump

Credits:

Nnekart: Art

Yuna: Programming & level design

Ellronde: Programming

Music:

"Blippy Trance" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
